description:
Tooru Acura has been wasting away his days with the motto Working is losing, but encounters http://anidb.net/ch62586 [Chaika] and decides to set out on a journey with her. He never seems to be able to say no to his younger sister http://anidb.net/ch62588 [Akari]. He is actually a survivor of saboteurs who were active during the recent war and is able to use the art of Iron Blood Transformation, which temporarily enhances his physical abilities.
Source: ANN
name: Tooru Acura
